encryptChat

Class ManageClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • encryptChat.ManageClient

  • public class ManageClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Permits to manage one or more client connected to different server
    Author:
    Francesco Cozzolino

      • addClient

        public void addClient(java.lang.String ip,
             int port,
             java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.String keyStore)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Creates and adds a client to the list of clients
        Parameters:
        ip - ip address of server who want to connect
        port - router's port of server
        name - user's name who want to chat
        keyStore - name of server's keystore
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • isConnect

        Returns the connection state
        Returns:
        true if the server was successfully connected to the server

        Tries to send a message to the server with the specified name
        Parameters:

        name - user's name of server side
        Returns:

        Parameters:
